3.2.0

For upgrade instructions, please refer to APIM Migration Guide

Important: If you plan to skip versions when you upgrade, ensure that you read the version-specific upgrade notes for each intermediate version. You may be required to perform manual actions as part of the upgrade.

APIM - 3.3.4 (2020-12-01)

Bug fixes

General

  • Backport #4655 to 3.3.x #4657

  • Backport 4578 #4608

  • Backport 4591 #4607

  • Backport 4620 and 4669 to 3.3.x #4630

  • Backport 4634 to 3.3.x #4636

  • Merge 3.2.3 #4676

Portal

  • Example cURL not displayed for an unpublished API on subscriptions #4680

Reporter

  • [elasticsearch] Template mapping of log is incorrect with ES 7.x #4685

Repository

  • [jdbc] Simple user without groups can see all the applications #4678

Improvements

Management

  • Check that the version of the accepted CGU is the current one #4603

  • Manage attached resources in API import/export #4315

APIM - 3.2.3 (2020-11-27)

Bug fixes

General

  • Merge 3.0.13 #4671

Management

  • Backport #4551 on 3.2.x #4552

  • Cannot reorder a page anymore #4417

  • Forbidden access with a Authorization bearer token #4440

  • Null constraint violation with jdbc repository at startup #4521

APIM - 3.0.13 (2020-11-26)

Bug fixes

General

  • Backport #4620 to 3.0.x #4629

  • Backport 4585 #4606

  • Backport 4591 to 3.0.x #4619

  • Merge 1.30.26 #4663

Management

  • API not found on global dashboard when deleted #4573

  • Cannot create an API and ask for review #4571

  • Config file user roles are ignored when user is assigned to a group before his first login #4586

  • Export logs in CSV should contain the user when it is displayed #4659

  • Importing theme with images fails #4179

  • Improve UI when search user to add #4599

  • Location header does not contain full path to resource #4624

  • Unable to delete the homepage background #4213

Portal

  • Cannot list more than 10 plans during the subscription #4653

  • Cannot search on labels with some special characters #4661

  • Missing X-Xsrf-Token header from the portal UI in APIM #4628

  • Size list of application log is not well updated #4662

Improvements

Management

  • Allows to export all the logs in a CSV and not only the current page #4664

Bug fixes

General

  • Typo in french portal translation when connection issues #4504

  • Cannot create an API from a Gravitee.io definition anymore #4570

  • Default admin can’t see/go to the dashboard and settings menu #4591

  • Default application is not correctly created for social / OAuth login #4634

  • Impossible to move documentation page to folder #4655

  • Portal and Schedulers sections appear two times in settings #4578

  • Redoc is not working with a private API on dist #4585

  • [quality-rules]unable to create a new quality-rule #4602

Plugin

  • Ensure plugin loading order #4486

Portal

  • Image links are broken on portal documentation #4620

Features

Gateway

  • Forward the X-Forwarded-Prefix to the backend endpoint #4434

  • Support for path-named parameters in Expression Language (EL) #4431

Management

  • Allows to manage authentication identity providers on the portal #3963

  • Global reviewer #4436

  • Label’s dictionary #4437

  • Move CORS from static to dynamic configuration #4432

  • Move SMTP from static to dynamic configuration #4433

  • Move notification templates in the UI #4297

  • Override settings via envvars #4452

  • Support tickets history #4435

  • [audit] Adapt audit system to Orgs & Envs #3976

Policy

  • [api-key] Allows to define custom api-key #4318

Reporter

  • [file] File reporter to write raw data (csv format) #4236

  • [tcp] Add support for a TCP reporter #4584

Repository

  • [hazelcast] Rate-limit support #4527

Improvements

Management

  • Allows to configure statically the theme #4456

  • Allows to define the background color of the login page from the theme #4458

  • Improve API Quality checks display #3201

  • Remove i18n support on the management UI #4485

Policy

  • [aws-lambda] Allows to extract data in execution context from payload #4395
